results.title: Zocor Forte (simvastatin) has a neuroprotective effect against LPS striatal dopaminergic terminals injury, whereas against MPP+ does not.
results.text_hl: Zocor Forte (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) has a neuroprotective effect against @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ striatal @<m>DISEASE_Immunologic_Deficiency_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007153 @@@dopaminergic terminals@@@ injury, whereas against MPP+ does not.
